entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Orangeville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:37 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Blizzard. Temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Blizzard developing this morning. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 then west 60 gusting to 90 early this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 24 this afternoon. Forecast issued 08:26 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Local snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 before morning. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 08:26 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
